basics.name: Matt Struble
basics.label: Principal Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: I'm passionate about open-source, generative AI, and digital privacy. I build systems that bridge research with production, enabling reliable, scalable AI. I never save anything for the swim back.

work.name: Nike
work.summary: Leading development of Nike’s AI/ML and GenAI platforms with a focus on scalable training, inference, and monitoring infrastructure.
highlights: Built unified debugging and observability tools that reduced model pipeline failures by 70%.
Led fine-tuning and serving of large vision-language models including SAM2, GroundingDino, and CLIP.
Created Terraform-based templates that cut GenAI deployment time by 50%.
Authored best-practice playbooks adopted across the Nike AI Community of Practice.

work.name: Nike
work.position: Lead Machine Learning Engineer – Analytics & GenAI
work.summary: Drove engineering excellence and production reliability for Nike’s AI ecosystem.
highlights: Migrated legacy ML workloads to AWS SageMaker, enabling cross-team scalability.
Developed standardized AWS/logging SDKs reducing production incidents by 90 %.
Established CI/CD standards, canary testing, and monitoring for GenAI services.

work.name: Freelance / Independent Projects
work.summary: Delivered applied ML solutions and research prototypes in vision, NLP, and AR.
highlights: Deep Learning Photo Aesthetics – created TensorFlow-based classifier using AVA dataset.
Heineken AR Cheers Campaign – built object-detection model powering adaptive AR marketing.
Climate Change Sentiment Analysis – used BERT and ensemble methods to track public opinion over time.

work.name: Draper
highlights: Aggregated multi-source flight data for advanced analytics.
Built ML-driven tools improving Guidance Navigation & Control algorithm accuracy.

work.name: Raytheon
highlights: Implemented signal-processing and control algorithms for radar sensor systems.

work.name: NetNumber
highlights: Enhanced telecom signaling performance for high-volume markets.

work.name: General Dynamics Mission Systems
highlights: Developed embedded C drivers and automated test frameworks for GNC systems.

work.name: Pfizer
highlights: Built internal social platform and IoT prototypes on Raspberry Pi and Google Glass.

awards.title: 2nd Place – Game Studio Game of the Year
